mapper.select: SELECT p.planner_no, p.planner_title, p.planner_txt, p.planner_date, p.member_no, m.name AS name FROM planner p JOIN member m ON p.member_no = m.member_no WHERE p.planner_no = #{planner_no}
SELECT p.planner_no, p.planner_title, p.planner_txt, p.planner_date, p.member_no, m.name AS name FROM planner p JOIN member m ON p.member_no = m.member_no WHERE m.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO planner (planner_title, planner_txt, planner_date, member_no) VALUES (#{planner_title}, #{planner_txt}, #{planner_date}, #{member_no})
